The diagrams for the dimers ( Figure 2 and Figure 3) are obtained using the M06-L/aug-cc-pVTZ functional [ 71] and basis set with a semi-empirical counterpoise-type correction for basis set superposition error, as implemented in Gaussian 09 [ 72]. The binding of larger stacks from either MD simulations or experimental data ( Figure 5) is quantified applying density functional based tight-binding with parameter set mio-1-1 [ 73].
